name: Dive into the abyss
description: You drive this submarine to the mysterious abyss, to find the legendary treasure. However, the monsters in the abyss are trying to tear you to pieces, and you must be brave enough to fight them in close quarters. Before each battle you have to take a deep breath, which will help you get a better fight and go deeper. As the saying goes, the deeper you breathe, the deeper you can reach.
